mapper.select: SELECT OBLG_PFRM_CCD , IB_DEAL_NO , RISK_INSPCT_CCD , LST_C_CASE_CCD , ITEM_SQ , RPR_PRGRS_ST_CD , APLC_END_DT_DT , ACHV_DT , RPR_RSN_CNTNT , OBLG_AMT , RPY_DT , RPY_AMT , OBLG_CNTNT , PFRM_DT , PFRM_PLAN_CNTNT , PRCS_PLAN_CNTNT1 , PRCS_PLAN_CNTNT2 , VAL_SPCL_CNTNT , APRV_DY_TM1 , APRV_P_ENO1 , APRV_DY_TM2 , APRV_P_ENO2 , APRV_DY_TM3 , APRV_P_ENO3 , APRV_DY_TM4 , APRV_P_ENO4 , APRV_DY_TM5 , APRV_P_ENO5 , FNL_MOFY_DY_TM , FNL_MDEY_P_ENO , HNDL_DY_TM , HNDL_DPRT_CD , HNDL_P_ENO , WRAP_GDS_CD , WRAP_GDS_NM , RPY_F , STD_YR_MM , BSNS_OUTLN_HNGL , CNST_CMPNY_NM , MAIN_PRGRS_STTN_CNTNT , PFRM_CNTNT , N_PFRM_RSN_CNTNT FROM RAA31B WHERE 1=1 AND OBLG_PFRM_CCD = #{oblgPfrmCcd} AND IB_DEAL_NO = #{ibDealNo} AND RISK_INSPCT_CCD = #{riskInspctCcd} AND LST_C_CASE_CCD = #{lstCCaseCcd} AND ITEM_SQ = #{itemSq}

SELECT IB_DEAL_NO AS IB_DEAL_NO , RISK_INSPCT_CCD AS RISK_INSPCT_CCD , LST_C_CASE_CCD AS LST_C_CASE_CCD , ITEM_SQ AS ITEM_SQ , FORMAT(OBLG_AMT, '#,###') AS OBLG_AMT , DATE_FORMAT(APLC_END_DT_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS APLC_END_DT_DT , DATE_FORMAT(RPY_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS RPY_DT , FORMAT(RPY_AMT, '#,###') AS RPY_AMT , FORMAT((OBLG_AMT - RPY_AMT), '#,###') AS UNPAY_AMT , HNDL_DY_TM AS HNDL_DY_TM , HNDL_DPRT_CD AS HNDL_DPRT_CD , HNDL_P_ENO AS HNDL_P_ENO FROM RAA31B WHERE IB_DEAL_NO = #{ibDealNo} AND RISK_INSPCT_CCD = #{riskInspctCcd} AND LST_C_CASE_CCD = #{lstCCaseCcd} AND OBLG_PFRM_CCD = '1' ORDER BY ITEM_SQ DESC
mapper.insert:
SELECT IFNULL(MAX(ITEM_SQ)+ 1, 1) AS ITEM_SQ FROM RAA31B WHERE IB_DEAL_NO = #{ibDealNo} AND RISK_INSPCT_CCD = #{riskInspctCcd} AND LST_C_CASE_CCD = #{lstCCaseCcd}
INSERT INTO RAA31B ( IB_DEAL_NO , RISK_INSPCT_CCD , LST_C_CASE_CCD , OBLG_PFRM_CCD , ITEM_SQ , APLC_END_DT_DT , OBLG_AMT , RPY_DT , RPY_AMT , HNDL_DY_TM , HNDL_DPRT_CD , HNDL_P_ENO ) VALUES ( #{ibDealNo} , #{riskInspctCcd} , #{lstCCaseCcd} , '1' , #{itemSq} , #{aplcEndDtDt} , REPLACE(#{oblgAmt}, ',', '') * 1 , #{rpyDt} , REPLACE(#{rpyAmt}, ',', '') * 1 , CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() , #{hndlDprtCd} , #{hndlPEno} )
mapper.select: SELECT A.IB_DEAL_NO AS IB_DEAL_NO , A.RISK_INSPCT_CCD AS RISK_INSPCT_CCD , A.LST_C_CASE_CCD AS LST_C_CASE_CCD , A.ITEM_SQ AS ITEM_SQ , DATE_FORMAT(A.APLC_END_DT_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS APLC_END_DT_DT , DATE_FORMAT(A.RPY_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS RPY_DT , A.OBLG_CNTNT AS OBLG_CNTNT , A.RPY_F AS RPY_F , A.HNDL_DY_TM AS HNDL_DY_TM , A.HNDL_DPRT_CD AS HNDL_DPRT_CD , A.HNDL_P_ENO AS HNDL_P_ENO FROM RAA31B A WHERE A.IB_DEAL_NO = #{ibDealNo} AND A.RISK_INSPCT_CCD = #{riskInspctCcd} AND A.LST_C_CASE_CCD = #{lstCCaseCcd} AND A.OBLG_PFRM_CCD = '2' ORDER BY ITEM_SQ DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE RAA31B SET RPR_PRGRS_ST_CD = '20' , APRV_DY_TM1 = SYSDATE() /* 결재일시1 */ , APRV_P_ENO1 = #{hndlPEno} /* 결재자사번1 */ , HNDL_DY_TM = SYSDATE() , HNDL_DPRT_CD = #{hndlDprtCd} , HNDL_P_ENO = #{hndlPEno} WHERE STD_YR_MM = #{stdYrMm} /* 기준년월 */ AND OBLG_PFRM_CCD = #{oblgPfrmCcd} /* 의무이행구분코드 */ AND IB_DEAL_NO = #{ibDealNo} /* Deal번호 */ AND RISK_INSPCT_CCD = #{riskInspctCcd} /* 리스크심사구분코드 */ AND LST_C_CASE_CCD = #{lstCCaseCcd} /* 부수안건구분코드 */ AND ITEM_SQ = #{itemSq} /* 항목일련번호 */

UPDATE RAA31B SET RPR_PRGRS_ST_CD = '11' , APRV_DY_TM1 = NULL , APRV_P_ENO1 = NULL , APRV_DY_TM2 = NULL , APRV_P_ENO2 = NULL , APRV_DY_TM3 = NULL , APRV_P_ENO3 = NULL , APRV_DY_TM4 = NULL , APRV_P_ENO4 = NULL , HNDL_DY_TM = SYSDATE() , HNDL_DPRT_CD = #{hndlDprtCd} , HNDL_P_ENO = #{hndlPEno} WHERE STD_YR_MM = #{stdYrMm} /* 기준년월 */ AND OBLG_PFRM_CCD = #{oblgPfrmCcd} /* 의무이행구분코드 */ AND IB_DEAL_NO = #{ibDealNo} /* Deal번호 */ AND RISK_INSPCT_CCD = #{riskInspctCcd} /* 리스크심사구분코드 */ AND LST_C_CASE_CCD = #{lstCCaseCcd} /* 부수안건구분코드 */ AND ITEM_SQ = #{itemSq} /* 항목일련번호 */

UPDATE RAA31B SET RPR_PRGRS_ST_CD = '30' , APRV_DY_TM2 = SYSDATE() /* 결재일시2 */ , APRV_P_ENO2 = #{hndlPEno} /* 결재자사번2 */ , HNDL_DY_TM = SYSDATE() , HNDL_DPRT_CD = #{hndlDprtCd} , HNDL_P_ENO = #{hndlPEno} WHERE STD_YR_MM = #{stdYrMm} /* 기준년월 */ AND OBLG_PFRM_CCD = #{oblgPfrmCcd} /* 의무이행구분코드 */ AND IB_DEAL_NO = #{ibDealNo} /* Deal번호 */ AND RISK_INSPCT_CCD = #{riskInspctCcd} /* 리스크심사구분코드 */ AND LST_C_CASE_CCD = #{lstCCaseCcd} /* 부수안건구분코드 */ AND ITEM_SQ = #{itemSq} /* 항목일련번호 */

UPDATE RAA31B SET RPR_PRGRS_ST_CD = '50' , APRV_DY_TM2 = SYSDATE() , APRV_P_ENO2 = #{hndlPEno} , APRV_DY_TM3 = SYSDATE() , APRV_P_ENO3 = #{hndlPEno} , APRV_DY_TM4 = SYSDATE() , APRV_P_ENO4 = #{hndlPEno} , HNDL_DY_TM = SYSDATE() , HNDL_DPRT_CD = #{hndlDprtCd} , HNDL_P_ENO = #{hndlPEno} WHERE STD_YR_MM = #{stdYrMm} /* 기준년월 */ AND OBLG_PFRM_CCD = #{oblgPfrmCcd} /* 의무이행구분코드 */ AND IB_DEAL_NO = #{ibDealNo} /* Deal번호 */ AND RISK_INSPCT_CCD = #{riskInspctCcd} /* 리스크심사구분코드 */ AND LST_C_CASE_CCD = #{lstCCaseCcd} /* 부수안건구분코드 */ AND ITEM_SQ = #{itemSq} /* 항목일련번호 */

UPDATE RAA31B SET RPR_PRGRS_ST_CD = '40' , APRV_DY_TM3 = SYSDATE() /* 결재일시3 */ , APRV_P_ENO3 = #{hndlPEno} /* 결재자사번3 */ , HNDL_DY_TM = SYSDATE() , HNDL_DPRT_CD = #{hndlDprtCd} , HNDL_P_ENO = #{hndlPEno} WHERE STD_YR_MM = #{stdYrMm} /* 기준년월 */ AND OBLG_PFRM_CCD = #{oblgPfrmCcd} /* 의무이행구분코드 */ AND IB_DEAL_NO = #{ibDealNo} /* Deal번호 */ AND RISK_INSPCT_CCD = #{riskInspctCcd} /* 리스크심사구분코드 */ AND LST_C_CASE_CCD = #{lstCCaseCcd} /* 부수안건구분코드 */ AND ITEM_SQ = #{itemSq} /* 항목일련번호 */

UPDATE RAA31B SET RPR_PRGRS_ST_CD = '50' , APRV_DY_TM4 = SYSDATE() /* 결재일시4 */ , APRV_P_ENO4 = #{hndlPEno} /* 결재자사번4 */ , HNDL_DY_TM = SYSDATE() , HNDL_DPRT_CD = #{hndlDprtCd} , HNDL_P_ENO = #{hndlPEno} WHERE STD_YR_MM = #{stdYrMm} /* 기준년월 */ AND OBLG_PFRM_CCD = #{oblgPfrmCcd} /* 의무이행구분코드 */ AND IB_DEAL_NO = #{ibDealNo} /* Deal번호 */ AND RISK_INSPCT_CCD = #{riskInspctCcd} /* 리스크심사구분코드 */ AND LST_C_CASE_CCD = #{lstCCaseCcd} /* 부수안건구분코드 */ AND ITEM_SQ = #{itemSq} /* 항목일련번호 */
mapper.select: SELECT A.IB_DEAL_NO /* Deal번호 */ , A.RISK_INSPCT_CCD /* 신규/재부의 */ , A.LST_C_CASE_CCD /* 부수안건 */ , A.OBLG_PFRM_CCD /* 이행구분 */ , A.IB_DEAL_NM /* 안건명 */ , A.FNC_GDS_DVD_CD /* 금융상품분류코드 */ , A.ITEM_SQ /* 일련번호 */ , A.INSPCT_CNFRNC_CCD /* 결의협의체 */ , ( SELECT rb.CD_VL_NM FROM RAA91B rb WHERE 1=1 AND rb.CMNS_CD_GRP = 'R007' AND rb.CD_VL_ID = A.INSPCT_CNFRNC_CCD ) AS INSPCT_CNFRNC_CCD_NM/* 결의협의체명 */ , A.RSLTN_DT /* 결의일 */ , A.RSLTN_RSLT_CD /* 결의결과 */ , A.RSLT_CNTNT /* 승인조건 */ , A.INVST_CRNCY_CD /* 승인금액통화코드 */ , A.RCG_AMT /* 승인금액 */ , A.APLC_AMT /* 셀다운 대상금액 */ , A.END_DT_END_DT /* 셀다운기한 */ , A.MTRT_HLD_AMT /* 만기보유금액 */ , A.OPN_PRC_VAL_AMT /* 잔고 */ , CASE WHEN CASE WHEN A.OPN_PRC_VAL_AMT - A.MTRT_HLD_AMT <= 0 THEN 0 ELSE IFNULL(A.OPN_PRC_VAL_AMT - A.MTRT_HLD_AMT, 0) END = 0 THEN '이행' ELSE '미이행' END AS PFRM_CLSF_NM /* 이행여부 */ , A.PFRM_DT /* 이행일자 */ , CASE WHEN A.OPN_PRC_VAL_AMT - A.MTRT_HLD_AMT <= 0 THEN 0 ELSE IFNULL(A.OPN_PRC_VAL_AMT - A.MTRT_HLD_AMT, 0) END AS NPRY_RA /* 미해소잔액 */ , A.RPR_PRGRS_ST_CD /* 진행상태코드 */ , ( SELECT rb.CD_VL_NM FROM RAA91B rb WHERE 1=1 AND rb.CMNS_CD_GRP = 'R016' AND rb.CD_VL_ID = A.RPR_PRGRS_ST_CD ) AS RPR_PRGRS_ST_CD_NM /* 진행상태코드명 */ , A.DPRT_CD /* 담당부서코드 */ , A.DPRT_NM /* 부서이름 */ , A.EMP_NM /* 담당자이름 */ , A.INSPCT_DPRT_CCD /* 심사부서코드 */ , A.OWN_EMP_NM /* 담당심사역코드 */ , A.RCG_RQS_DT /* 승인요청일 */ , A.RCG_DT /* 승인일 */ , A.CNFR_DT1 /* 심사역확인일 */ , A.CNFR_DT2 /* 심사부서장확인일 */ , A.BSNS_OUTLN_HNGL /* 사업개요 */ , A.CNST_CMPNY_NM /* 시행사/시공사 */ , A.MAIN_PRGRS_STTN_CNTNT /* 최근사업 진행현황 */ , A.ACHV_DT /* 셀다운목표일 */ , A.N_PFRM_RSN_CNTNT /* 미이행사유 */ , A.PFRM_PLAN_CNTNT /* 향후계획 */ , A.PRCS_PLAN_CNTNT1 /* BaseCase */ , A.PRCS_PLAN_CNTNT2 /* StressCase */ , A.VAL_SPCL_CNTNT /* 기타특이사항 */ FROM (SELECT '01' AS OBLG_PFRM_CCD , A.IB_DEAL_NO , A.RISK_INSPCT_CCD , A.LST_C_CASE_CCD , A.IB_DEAL_NM , A.FNC_GDS_DVD_CD , A.ITEM_SQ , A.INSPCT_CNFRNC_CCD , A.RSLTN_DT , A.INVST_CRNCY_CD , A.RCG_AMT , A.RSLT_CNTNT , A.RSLTN_RSLT_CD , A.END_DT_END_DT , A.APLC_AMT , A.RCG_AMT - A.APLC_AMT AS MTRT_HLD_AMT , IFNULL(B.CRNCY_BK_AMT, 0) AS OPN_PRC_VAL_AMT , A.PFRM_DT , A.RPR_PRGRS_ST_CD , (SELECT RPR_PRGRS_ST_CD_NM FROM RAA31B WHERE IB_DEAL_NO = A.RPR_PRGRS_ST_CD) AS RPR_PRGRS_ST_CD_NM , A.DPRT_CD , (SELECT DPRT_NM FROM RAA98A WHERE DPRT_CD = A.DPRT_CD) AS DPRT_NM , A.CHRG_P_ENO , (SELECT EMP_NM FROM RAA92B WHERE ENO = A.CHRG_P_ENO) AS EMP_NM , A.INSPCT_DPRT_CCD , A.OWN_P_ENO , (SELECT EMP_NM FROM RAA92B WHERE ENO = A.OWN_P_ENO) AS OWN_EMP_NM , A.RCG_RQS_DT , A.RCG_DT , A.CNFR_DT1 , A.CNFR_DT2 , A.BSNS_OUTLN_HNGL , A.CNST_CMPNY_NM , A.MAIN_PRGRS_STTN_CNTNT , A.ACHV_DT , A.N_PFRM_RSN_CNTNT , A.PFRM_PLAN_CNTNT , A.PRCS_PLAN_CNTNT1 , A.PRCS_PLAN_CNTNT2 , A.VAL_SPCL_CNTNT FROM (SELECT #{stdYrMm} AS STD_YR_MM , A.IB_DEAL_NO , A.RISK_INSPCT_CCD , A.LST_C_CASE_CCD , A.IB_DEAL_SNM_NM AS IB_DEAL_NM , A.FNC_GDS_DVD_CD , C.ITEM_SQ , NULL AS RPR_PRGRS_ST_CD , NULL AS RPR_PRGRS_ST_CD_NM , (SELECT CASE WHEN ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY rb.STD_YR_MM DESC) = 1 THEN rb.BSNS_OUTLN_HNGL ELSE NULL END AS BSNS_OUTLN_HNGL FROM RAA31B rb WHERE rb.OBLG_PFRM_CCD = '01' AND rb.IB_DEAL_NO = A.IB_DEAL_NO AND rb.RISK_INSPCT_CCD = A.RISK_INSPCT_CCD AND rb.LST_C_CASE_CCD = A.LST_C_CASE_CCD LIMIT 1) AS BSNS_OUTLN_HNGL , (SELECT CASE WHEN ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY rb.STD_YR_MM DESC) = 1 THEN rb.CNST_CMPNY_NM ELSE NULL END AS CNST_CMPNY_NM FROM RAA31B rb WHERE rb.OBLG_PFRM_CCD = '01' AND rb.IB_DEAL_NO = A.IB_DEAL_NO AND rb.RISK_INSPCT_CCD = A.RISK_INSPCT_CCD AND rb.LST_C_CASE_CCD = A.LST_C_CASE_CCD LIMIT 1) AS CNST_CMPNY_NM , (SELECT CASE WHEN ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY rb.MAIN_PRGRS_STTN_CNTNT DESC) = 1 THEN rb.MAIN_PRGRS_STTN_CNTNT ELSE NULL END AS MAIN_PRGRS_STTN_CNTNT FROM RAA31B rb WHERE rb.OBLG_PFRM_CCD = '01' AND rb.IB_DEAL_NO = A.IB_DEAL_NO AND rb.RISK_INSPCT_CCD = A.RISK_INSPCT_CCD AND rb.LST_C_CASE_CCD = A.LST_C_CASE_CCD LIMIT 1) AS MAIN_PRGRS_STTN_CNTNT , NULL AS ACHV_DT , NULL AS N_PFRM_RSN_CNTNT , NULL AS PFRM_PLAN_CNTNT , NULL AS PRCS_PLAN_CNTNT1 , NULL AS PRCS_PLAN_CNTNT2 , NULL AS VAL_SPCL_CNTNT , NULL AS RCG_RQS_DT , NULL AS RCG_DT , NULL AS CNFR_DT1 , NULL AS CNFR_DT2 , A.DPRT_CD , A.CHRG_P_ENO , A.INSPCT_DPRT_CCD , A.OWN_P_ENO , A.INVST_CRNCY_CD , A.RISK_RCG_NO , B.INSPCT_CNFRNC_CCD , B.RSLTN_DT , B.RCG_AMT , CASE WHEN B.RSLTN_RSLT_CD = '2' THEN REPLACE(B.RSLT_CNTNT, CHR(10), ' ') WHEN B.RSLTN_RSLT_CD = '3' THEN REPLACE(B.CNFRNC_NTM_CNDTL_CNTNT , CHR(10), ' ') ELSE NULL END AS RSLT_CNTNT , B.RSLTN_RSLT_CD , C.END_DT_END_DT , IFNULL(C.APLC_AMT, 0) AS APLC_AMT , IFNULL(C.MTRT_HLD_AMT, 0) AS MTRT_HLD_AMT , C.PFRM_DT FROM RAA02B A LEFT JOIN RAA22B B ON A.IB_DEAL_NO = B.IB_DEAL_NO AND A.RISK_INSPCT_CCD = B.RISK_INSPCT_CCD AND A.LST_C_CASE_CCD = B.LST_C_CASE_CCD LEFT JOIN RAA09B C ON A.IB_DEAL_NO = C.IB_DEAL_NO AND A.RISK_INSPCT_CCD = C.RISK_INSPCT_CCD AND A.LST_C_CASE_CCD = C.LST_C_CASE_CCD WHERE A.INSPCT_PRGRS_ST_CD = '500' AND A.END_DT IS NULL AND B.SDN_CNDT_F = 'Y' AND C.END_DT_END_DT <= DATE_FORMAT( LAST_DAY(DATE_FORMAT( CONCAT(#{stdYrMm}, '01'), '%Y%m%d')), '%Y%m%d') AND #{stdYrMm} = DATE_FORMAT(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE(), -1) , '%Y%m%d') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM RAA31B rb WHERE rb.OBLG_PFRM_CCD = '01' AND rb.IB_DEAL_NO = A.IB_DEAL_NO AND rb.RISK_INSPCT_CCD = A.RISK_INSPCT_CCD AND rb.LST_C_CASE_CCD = A.LST_C_CASE_CCD AND rb.ITEM_SQ = C.ITEM_SQ AND rb.STD_YR_MM = #{stdYrMm}) /* 작성이력이 없는 대상만 출력 */ UNION ALL SELECT A.STD_YR_MM , A.IB_DEAL_NO , A.RISK_INSPCT_CCD , A.LST_C_CASE_CCD , B.IB_DEAL_SNM_NM AS IB_DEAL_NM , B.FNC_GDS_DVD_CD , A.ITEM_SQ , A.RPR_PRGRS_ST_CD , ( SELECT rb.CD_VL_NM FROM RAA91B rb WHERE 1=1 AND rb.CMNS_CD_GRP = 'R016' AND rb.CD_VL_ID = A.RPR_PRGRS_ST_CD ) AS RPR_PRGRS_ST_CD_NM , A.BSNS_OUTLN_HNGL , A.CNST_CMPNY_NM , A.MAIN_PRGRS_STTN_CNTNT , A.ACHV_DT , A.N_PFRM_RSN_CNTNT , A.PFRM_PLAN_CNTNT , A.PRCS_PLAN_CNTNT1 , A.PRCS_PLAN_CNTNT2 , A.VAL_SPCL_CNTNT , DATE_FORMAT(A.APRV_DY_TM1,'%Y%m%d') AS RCG_RQS_DT , DATE_FORMAT(A.APRV_DY_TM2,'%Y%m%d') AS RCG_DT , DATE_FORMAT(A.APRV_DY_TM3,'%Y%m%d') AS CNFR_DT1 , DATE_FORMAT(A.APRV_DY_TM4,'%Y%m%d') AS CNFR_DT2 , B.DPRT_CD , B.CHRG_P_ENO , B.INSPCT_DPRT_CCD , B.OWN_P_ENO , B.INVST_CRNCY_CD , B.RISK_RCG_NO , C.INSPCT_CNFRNC_CCD , C.RSLTN_DT , C.RCG_AMT , CASE WHEN C.RSLTN_RSLT_CD = '2' THEN REPLACE(C.RSLT_CNTNT, CHR(10), ' ') WHEN C.RSLTN_RSLT_CD = '3' THEN REPLACE(C.CNFRNC_NTM_CNDTL_CNTNT , CHR(10), ' ') ELSE NULL END AS RSLT_CNTNT , C.RSLTN_RSLT_CD , D.END_DT_END_DT , D.APLC_AMT , D.MTRT_HLD_AMT , D.PFRM_DT FROM RAA31B A LEFT JOIN RAA02B B ON A.IB_DEAL_NO = B.IB_DEAL_NO AND A.RISK_INSPCT_CCD = B.RISK_INSPCT_CCD AND A.LST_C_CASE_CCD = B.LST_C_CASE_CCD LEFT JOIN RAA22B C ON A.IB_DEAL_NO = C.IB_DEAL_NO AND A.RISK_INSPCT_CCD = C.RISK_INSPCT_CCD AND A.LST_C_CASE_CCD = C.LST_C_CASE_CCD LEFT JOIN RAA09B D ON A.IB_DEAL_NO = D.IB_DEAL_NO AND A.RISK_INSPCT_CCD = D.RISK_INSPCT_CCD AND A.LST_C_CASE_CCD = D.LST_C_CASE_CCD AND A.ITEM_SQ = D.ITEM_SQ ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT rb.RISK_RCG_NO , SUM(rb.CRNCY_BK_AMT) AS CRNCY_BK_AMT FROM RAA59B rb WHERE rb.STD_YR_MM = #{stdYrMm} GROUP BY rb.RISK_RCG_NO ) B ON A.RISK_RCG_NO = B.RISK_RCG_NO ) A WHERE CASE WHEN A.OPN_PRC_VAL_AMT - A.MTRT_HLD_AMT <= 0 THEN 0 ELSE IFNULL(A.OPN_PRC_VAL_AMT - A.MTRT_HLD_AMT, 0) END != 0 AND (IF(#{chrgPEno} = '', NULL, FALSE) IS NULL) OR A.CHRG_P_ENO = UPPER(#{chrgPEno}) /* 담당자사번 */ AND (IF(#{inspctDprtCcd} = '', NULL, FALSE) IS NULL) OR A.INSPCT_DPRT_CCD = #{inspctDprtCcd} /* 심사부서코드 */ AND (IF(#{ownPEno} = '', NULL, FALSE) IS NULL) OR A.OWN_P_ENO = UPPER(#{ownPEno}) /* 심사역사번 */ AND (IF(#{rprPrgrsStCd} = '', NULL, FALSE) IS NULL) OR A.RPR_PRGRS_ST_CD = #{rprPrgrsStCd} /* 진행상태코드 */ AND (IF(#{ibDealNm} = '', NULL, FALSE) IS NULL) OR UPPER(A.IB_DEAL_NM) LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(#{ibDealNm}), '%') /* 안건명 */ AND (IF(#{dprtCd} = '', NULL, FALSE) IS NULL) OR A.DPRT_CD = UPPER(#{dprtCd}) /* 부점코드 */ ORDER BY A.DPRT_CD , A.IB_DEAL_NO , A.RISK_INSPCT_CCD , A.LST_C_CASE_CCD , A.ITEM_SQ

SELECT A.STD_YR_MM /* 기준년월 */ , A.IB_DEAL_NO /* Deal번호 */ , A.RISK_INSPCT_CCD /* 신규/재부의 */ , A.LST_C_CASE_CCD /* 부수안건 */ , A.OBLG_PFRM_CCD /* 이행구분 */ , A.IB_DEAL_NM /* 안건명 */ , A.FNC_GDS_DVD_CD /* 금융상품분류코드 */ , A.ITEM_SQ /* 일련번호 */ , A.INSPCT_CNFRNC_CCD /* 결의협의체 */ , A.RSLTN_DT /* 결의일 */ , A.RSLTN_RSLT_CD /* 결의결과코드 */ , A.RSLT_CNTNT /* 승인조건 */ , CASE WHEN END_F = 'Y' THEN '이행' ELSE '미이행' END AS PFRM_CLSF_NM /* 이행여부 */ , A.PFRM_DT /* 이행일 */ , IFNULL(A.END_F, 'N') AS END_F /* 종결여부 */ , A.RPR_PRGRS_ST_CD /* 진행상태코드 */ , ( SELECT rb.CD_VL_NM FROM RAA91B rb WHERE 1=1 AND rb.CMNS_CD_GRP = 'R016' AND rb.CD_VL_ID = A.RPR_PRGRS_ST_CD ) AS RPR_PRGRS_ST_CD_NM /* 진행상태코드명 */ , A.DPRT_NM /* 부서이름 */ , A.EMP_NM /* 담당자이름 */ , A.INSPCT_DPRT_CCD /* 심사부서코드 */ , A.OWN_EMP_NM /* 담당심사역 */ , A.RCG_RQS_DT /* 승인요청일 */ , A.RCG_DT /* 승인일 */ , A.CNFR_DT1 /* 심사역확인일 */ , A.CNFR_DT2 /* 심사부서장확인일 */ , A.BSNS_OUTLN_HNGL /* 사업개요 */ , A.CNST_CMPNY_NM /* 시행사/시공사 */ , A.MAIN_PRGRS_STTN_CNTNT /* 최근사업 진행현황 */ , A.N_PFRM_RSN_CNTNT /* 미이행사유 */ , A.PFRM_PLAN_CNTNT /* 향후계획 */ , A.PRCS_PLAN_CNTNT1 /* BaseCase */ , A.PRCS_PLAN_CNTNT2 /* StressCase */ , A.VAL_SPCL_CNTNT /* 기타특이사항 */ FROM (SELECT '02' AS OBLG_PFRM_CCD , A.STD_YR_MM , A.IB_DEAL_NO , A.RISK_INSPCT_CCD , A.LST_C_CASE_CCD , A.IB_DEAL_NM , A.FNC_GDS_DVD_CD , A.ITEM_SQ , A.INSPCT_CNFRNC_CCD , A.RSLTN_DT , A.RSLTN_RSLT_CD , REPLACE(A.OBLG_CNTNT, CHR(10), ' ') AS RSLT_CNTNT , A.PFRM_DT , A.END_F , A.RPR_PRGRS_ST_CD , A.DPRT_CD , (SELECT DPRT_NM FROM RAA98A WHERE DPRT_CD = A.DPRT_CD) AS DPRT_NM , A.CHRG_P_ENO , (SELECT EMP_NM FROM RAA92B WHERE ENO = A.CHRG_P_ENO) AS EMP_NM , A.INSPCT_DPRT_CCD , A.OWN_P_ENO , (SELECT EMP_NM FROM RAA92B WHERE ENO = A.OWN_P_ENO) AS OWN_EMP_NM , A.RCG_RQS_DT , A.RCG_DT , A.CNFR_DT1 , A.CNFR_DT2 , A.BSNS_OUTLN_HNGL , A.CNST_CMPNY_NM , A.MAIN_PRGRS_STTN_CNTNT , A.N_PFRM_RSN_CNTNT , A.PFRM_PLAN_CNTNT , A.PRCS_PLAN_CNTNT1 , A.PRCS_PLAN_CNTNT2 , A.VAL_SPCL_CNTNT FROM (SELECT #{stdYrMm} AS STD_YR_MM , A.IB_DEAL_NO , A.RISK_INSPCT_CCD , A.LST_C_CASE_CCD , A.IB_DEAL_SNM_NM AS IB_DEAL_NM , A.FNC_GDS_DVD_CD , C.ITEM_SQ , NULL AS RPR_PRGRS_ST_CD , (SELECT CASE WHEN ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY rb.STD_YR_MM DESC) = 1 THEN rb.BSNS_OUTLN_HNGL ELSE NULL END AS BSNS_OUTLN_HNGL FROM RAA31B rb WHERE rb.OBLG_PFRM_CCD = '02' AND rb.IB_DEAL_NO = A.IB_DEAL_NO AND rb.RISK_INSPCT_CCD = A.RISK_INSPCT_CCD AND rb.LST_C_CASE_CCD = A.LST_C_CASE_CCD LIMIT 1) AS BSNS_OUTLN_HNGL , (SELECT CASE WHEN ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY rb.STD_YR_MM DESC) = 1 THEN rb.CNST_CMPNY_NM ELSE NULL END AS CNST_CMPNY_NM FROM RAA31B rb WHERE rb.OBLG_PFRM_CCD = '01' AND rb.IB_DEAL_NO = A.IB_DEAL_NO AND rb.RISK_INSPCT_CCD = A.RISK_INSPCT_CCD AND rb.LST_C_CASE_CCD = A.LST_C_CASE_CCD LIMIT 1) AS CNST_CMPNY_NM , (SELECT CASE WHEN ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY rb.MAIN_PRGRS_STTN_CNTNT DESC) = 1 THEN rb.MAIN_PRGRS_STTN_CNTNT ELSE NULL END AS MAIN_PRGRS_STTN_CNTNT FROM RAA31B rb WHERE rb.OBLG_PFRM_CCD = '01' AND rb.IB_DEAL_NO = A.IB_DEAL_NO AND rb.RISK_INSPCT_CCD = A.RISK_INSPCT_CCD AND rb.LST_C_CASE_CCD = A.LST_C_CASE_CCD LIMIT 1) AS MAIN_PRGRS_STTN_CNTNT , NULL AS N_PFRM_RSN_CNTNT , NULL AS PFRM_PLAN_CNTNT , NULL AS PRCS_PLAN_CNTNT1 , NULL AS PRCS_PLAN_CNTNT2 , NULL AS VAL_SPCL_CNTNT , NULL AS RCG_RQS_DT , NULL AS RCG_DT , NULL AS CNFR_DT1 , NULL AS CNFR_DT2 , A.DPRT_CD , A.CHRG_P_ENO , A.INSPCT_DPRT_CCD , A.OWN_P_ENO , A.INVST_CRNCY_CD , B.INSPCT_CNFRNC_CCD , B.RSLTN_DT , B.RSLTN_RSLT_CD , B.RCG_AMT , C.OBLG_CNTNT , C.PFRM_DT , C.RMRK , IFNULL(C.END_F, 'N') AS END_F FROM RAA02B A LEFT JOIN RAA22B B ON A.IB_DEAL_NO = B.IB_DEAL_NO AND A.RISK_INSPCT_CCD = B.RISK_INSPCT_CCD AND A.LST_C_CASE_CCD = B.LST_C_CASE_CCD LEFT JOIN RAA10B C ON A.IB_DEAL_NO = C.IB_DEAL_NO AND A.RISK_INSPCT_CCD = C.RISK_INSPCT_CCD AND A.LST_C_CASE_CCD = C.LST_C_CASE_CCD WHERE A.INSPCT_PRGRS_ST_CD = '500' /* 심사진행상태코드(약정완료) */ AND A.END_DT IS NULL /* EXIT가 아직 안된 안건들 */ AND B.ETC_CNDT_F = 'Y' /* 기타조건여부 */ AND #{stdYrMm} = DATE_FORMAT(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE(), -1), '%Y%m%d') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM RAA31B rb WHERE rb.OBLG_PFRM_CCD = '02' AND rb.IB_DEAL_NO = A.IB_DEAL_NO AND rb.RISK_INSPCT_CCD = A.RISK_INSPCT_CCD AND rb.LST_C_CASE_CCD = A.LST_C_CASE_CCD AND rb.ITEM_SQ = C.ITEM_SQ AND rb.STD_YR_MM = #{stdYrMm}) /* 작성이력이 없는 대상만 출력 */ UNION ALL SELECT A.STD_YR_MM , A.IB_DEAL_NO , A.RISK_INSPCT_CCD , A.LST_C_CASE_CCD , B.IB_DEAL_SNM_NM AS IB_DEAL_NM , B.FNC_GDS_DVD_CD , A.ITEM_SQ , A.RPR_PRGRS_ST_CD , A.BSNS_OUTLN_HNGL , A.CNST_CMPNY_NM , A.MAIN_PRGRS_STTN_CNTNT , A.N_PFRM_RSN_CNTNT , A.PFRM_PLAN_CNTNT , A.PRCS_PLAN_CNTNT1 , A.PRCS_PLAN_CNTNT2 , A.VAL_SPCL_CNTNT , DATE_FORMAT(A.APRV_DY_TM1, '%Y%m%d') AS RCG_RQS_DT , DATE_FORMAT(A.APRV_DY_TM2, '%Y%m%d') AS RCG_DT , DATE_FORMAT(A.APRV_DY_TM3, '%Y%m%d') AS CNFR_DT1 , DATE_FORMAT(A.APRV_DY_TM4, '%Y%m%d') AS CNFR_DT2 , B.DPRT_CD , B.CHRG_P_ENO , B.INSPCT_DPRT_CCD , B.OWN_P_ENO , B.INVST_CRNCY_CD , C.INSPCT_CNFRNC_CCD , C.RSLTN_DT , C.RSLTN_RSLT_CD , C.RCG_AMT , D.OBLG_CNTNT , D.PFRM_DT , D.RMRK , IFNULL(D.END_F, 'N') AS END_F FROM RAA31B A LEFT JOIN RAA02B B ON A.IB_DEAL_NO = B.IB_DEAL_NO AND A.RISK_INSPCT_CCD = B.RISK_INSPCT_CCD AND A.LST_C_CASE_CCD = B.LST_C_CASE_CCD LEFT JOIN RAA22B C ON A.IB_DEAL_NO = C.IB_DEAL_NO AND A.RISK_INSPCT_CCD = C.RISK_INSPCT_CCD AND A.LST_C_CASE_CCD = C.LST_C_CASE_CCD LEFT JOIN RAA10B D ON A.IB_DEAL_NO = D.IB_DEAL_NO AND A.RISK_INSPCT_CCD = D.RISK_INSPCT_CCD AND A.LST_C_CASE_CCD = D.LST_C_CASE_CCD AND A.ITEM_SQ = D.ITEM_SQ ) A ) A WHERE 1=1 AND (IF(#{chrgPEno} = '', NULL, FALSE) IS NULL) OR A.CHRG_P_ENO = UPPER(#{chrgPEno}) /* 담당자사번 */ AND (IF(#{inspctDprtCcd} = '', NULL, FALSE) IS NULL) OR A.INSPCT_DPRT_CCD = #{inspctDprtCcd} /* 심사부서코드 */ AND (IF(#{ownPEno} = '', NULL, FALSE) IS NULL) OR A.OWN_P_ENO = UPPER(#{ownPEno}) /* 심사역사번 */ AND (IF(#{rprPrgrsStCd} = '', NULL, FALSE) IS NULL) OR A.RPR_PRGRS_ST_CD = #{rprPrgrsStCd} /* 진행상태코드 */ AND (IF(#{ibDealNm} = '', NULL, FALSE) IS NULL) OR UPPER(A.IB_DEAL_NM) LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(#{ibDealNm}), '%') /* 안건명 */ AND (IF(#{dprtCd} = '', NULL, FALSE) IS NULL) OR A.DPRT_CD = UPPER(#{dprtCd}) /* 부점코드 */ AND 1 = CASE WHEN (#{endF} = 'N' AND A.RPR_PRGRS_ST_CD != '50' AND A.END_F = 'Y') OR (#{endF} = 'N' AND (A.RPR_PRGRS_ST_CD IS NULL OR RPR_PRGRS_ST_CD != '50') AND A.END_F = 'N') THEN 1 WHEN #{endF} = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ORDER BY A.DPRT_CD , A.IB_DEAL_NO , A.RISK_INSPCT_CCD , A.LST_C_CASE_CCD , A.ITEM_SQ
